short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for Instagram users to swiftly find story viewers. Simple, efficient, and well-integrated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever found yourself tediously scrolling through a long list of viewers on your Instagram story, trying to spot specific individuals? It can be quite a hassle, especially when the viewer count soars above the 150-200 mark. While Instagram itself may not offer a search feature for story viewers due to its operational complexities, there's a client-side solution to this problem: InstaStorySearch.

InstaStorySearch is a handy Chrome extension that empowers users to effortlessly search through the list of their Instagram story viewers. Tailor-made for influencers, marketers, and anyone actively engaged on Instagram, this tool blends perfectly with the Instagram interface. It elevates your social media experience, making it more efficient and user-friendly by eliminating the need for endless scrolling. Now, finding specific viewers on your stories is just a search away!
